item.title: Report X-2023061132
item.description:
Report X-2023061132

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-17T15:10:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-13
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND COMPLETELY DESTROYED. THE SIDES WAS ABSORBED FROM THE LEAKAGE THROUGHOUT THE CARDBOARD BOX. DescribePack: THE CAP INSIDE THE PACKAGE WAS SLIGHLY NOT ON THE CONTAINER. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS NEEDED FOR THE SPILL.
